review: I can't believe the usefulness of this device. Setting the Chromecast for the first time is as easy as it gets. Once you're good to go you can start sending content right away (streaming via internet or sending local files). So far no issues and all of my devices recognize the Chromecast inmediately.Can't recommend it highly enough.!!
author: Cesar Morillo

review: Fine, but still haven't really figured out when to use it.  Didnt know when I bought it and played with several times.  Works fine but I just don't have a use case that says I gotta have me some chromecast.
author: BG

review: Came fast works great I'm watching showbox as we speak lol .
author: Brenda ahmed

review: Cromecast seems like it can't keep up wile  streaming video
author: Vincent John Daniele Jr

review: Didnt meet my expectation. Very slow and poor quality. Reason could be comcast's poor internet quality also.
author: Nik Patel
